thread.section_title: PRO Import Tuners.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PRO Import Tuners.com | proimporttuners.com
thread.title: Joshua Polce
thread.title_full: PRO Import Tuners.com reviewed by Joshua Polce

author: Joshua Polce
title: Joshua Polce
text: One of the best companies I've ever dealt with. First off any questions I had were answered when ever I called. Very helpful and informative people. I was very unsure in the product I was interested in until I talked to Oscar. He was able to clear up any doubts I had and gave me more confidence in the product I wanted. Second their price was very hard to beat. Very reasonably priced. Lastly they shipped it to me so fast. I've never had something show up at my doorstep so quickly. It was here in 2 days! So much faster than Amazon and I didn't have to pay extra for shipping. Great company awesome people fast shipping. 10 out of 10!
